page.title: 09The Red Hart Inn
page.content: THE SURVEY OF PEOPLE DRINKING AND EATING IN THE PUB DURING A TUESDAY LUNCH TIME SHOWED THEY ALL CAME FROM AT LEAST THREE MILES AWAY.EIGHT OF THE TWENTY FIVE WERE HOLIDAY MAKERS.THIS MEANS A LOT OF CARS HAVE TO DRIVE THROUGH NARROW LANES TO THE PUB,ALTHOUGH THERE IS GOOD PARKING SPACE AT THE PUB.THERE IS A JUKE BOX IN THE PUB.WE ASKED HOUSEHOLDERS LIVING NEARBY IF THEY HAD ANY COMPLAINTS ABOUT THE NOISE AND TRAFFIC.THEY ANSWERED THAT THE PUB CLIENTS WERE VERY WELL BEHAVED.THE LOCAL POLICEMEN TOLD US HE HAD HAD NO TROUBLE OR DISTURBANCE.
